QmlGradientDescent(optimization_steps, optimizer)

Gradient Descent Optimizer
class QAOA.optimizers.qml_gradient_descent.QmlGradientDescent(optimization_steps: int, optimizer: GradientDescentOptimizer)¶

Gradient Descent Optimizer

Using GradientDescentOptimizer from library pennylane.

optimization_steps¶

number of optimization steps

Type:

int

optimizer¶

object of class GradientDescentOptimizer or inheriting from this class

Type:

qml.GradientDescentOptimizer

minimize(func, init):

Returns params which leads to the lowest value of the provided function

Methods

minimize1(func, init)

Returns params which leads to the lowest value of the provided function

Methods:

minimize1(func, init)

Returns params which leads to the lowest value of the provided function
minimize1(func: Callable[[float | list[float]], float], init: float | list[float]) → float | list[float]¶

Returns params which leads to the lowest value of the provided function

Parameters:

  • func (Callable[[ArgsType], float]) – function, which will be minimize

  • init (ArgsType) – initial args for optimizer

Returns:

params – Returns args which gave the lowest value.

Return type:

ArgsType
